attributes.title: So sad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to bless myself with Daddy Trump. But when my children Bethany and Melissa, two very sexy 12 year old girls, gazed upon Daddy Trumps face, they went blind, got polio, and turned orange! Thankfully they’re not vaccinated because that’s poison so they didn’t get Autism. But now I have to put them down because they can’t produce children now and so they are worthless. Now I’m just an 18 year old mother without any children. Who will make .75 cents on the white mans dollar in my name now? No one. And that’s cuz the libtards want my daughters to live. Hell no. I will do anything to spite them.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️tiktok🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app not expecting to see an orange 🍊 when I opened it but I did and it scared me like I freaked out! The app took about 7 days to download😤😳! During the time iv been using the app like a brainwashed me it’s like a weird voices and I kept seeing trump 2020 everywhere it’s scary I have nightmares because of the app😭😖.  Like it said things of how you are racist homophobic and sexist and I’m a girl that is part of the lgbtq🏳️‍🌈 and supports people of all color🥰. Over all the app was a disappointment sorry not sorry😝. I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THID APP UNLESS YOU ARE TRYING TO BE PERMANENTLY SCARED FOR LIFE FROM THE ORANGE HOMOPHOBIC SEXIST RACIST MAN!!!! Have a good day eveyone😘

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP🚨😾❌🔥‼️
attributes.review:
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!😾😾😾😾😾😾 As a ✨trump supporter✨ i was very excited to download this app and use it. It’s absolutely awful. After 👿4 weeks👿of the app downloading, I opened it and my phone became so hot it burned my hand 🖐🔥 The app crashed and now my phone is all glitchy and won’t stop making 
🚨BEEPING🚨 noises and every once in a while it’ll scream at me😿😿😿😿😿 the screams made my mom fall down the stairs and out the door and into the road where an 🚛18 wheeler🚛 ran over her. it was all because of this awful and poorly made app. get this app deleted! it’s totally unsafe and broken!!!!!😾😾😾😾😾😿😿😿😿😿‼️‼️‼️‼️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I thought that I would be able to get this app so I can support my amazing president but as soon as it downloaded it was being extremely racist towards me and said that they will destroy my whole friends and family all because I am a woman of color.😟 But I was like “that cannot be true because my president isn’t racist😡” but unfortunately the app told me that I don’t deserve any rights at all because I am black. He even told me to go back to Africa and I haven’t even lived in Africa ever, so they just assumed. Now that I know my president is racist, I will not be supporting him.😝😝😝😝😝😝

attributes.title: What happened
attributes.review: I decided to download this app so I can become ✨educated✨ by our amazing orange ✨president✨🥰 once It downloaded after 3 months I woke up in the hospital 🏥and they told be i had been in a coma for a month. I don’t remember anything after downloading this app. All I know is random racist and sexist things. I’m now home and I don’t remember where the bathroom is so I’ve been pooping with my dog outside 🐶 it’s like rlly great bonding I recommend to everyone. But anywho I’m not sure what’s been going on for a month but I don’t think u should get this app unless u wanna forget a bunch of things 😊✌🏼✨

attributes.title: It didn’t work. 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️✨✨✨
attributes.review: Im not good at reviews but here’s my story. In case you don’t want to read it all, this app didn’t work for me, it did not convince me to join the trumpies. So my dad is a trumpie and we usually get into fights over it because I’m like all the opposite of whatever a trumpie is. I really wanted to understand my dad’s point of view and know why he would support him. So I got this app and it was terrible! I just read a review stating this app made them die!! So tragic. Also so tragic this app didn’t convince me to join the trumpies. Anyways sending love to all my gen Z out there 😉🧚🏻‍♀️❤️✨

attributes.title: I wish I could give less than one star
attributes.review: For starters, why does the app need so much information? And the user’s location? It is full of propaganda and hate for the other party, it does not outline a plan to help this country’s CITIZENS but only to bring down “democratic socialists.” What will he do for the people? Will he fix the legal system? Make healthcare more affordable? Revise our welfare system? Or is this just all about not having a democrat in office? Do not suggest downloading this up. It is a waste of time AND it will eat your battery life. Also, don’t vote Trump. He is anti people. ACAB. BLM. LGBTQ+. WOMENS RIGHTS. DO NOT VOTE TRUMP OR YOU ARE A WHITE SUPREMACIST.

attributes.title: WORST APP! IT KEPT CRASHING AND STEALING MY INFO!!!
attributes.review: I was very disappointed by this app, and if i could give zero stars i would. First, the app took 3 days to download. Then, once the app finally downloaded i clicked on it and the  whole thing crashed and deleted itself. So, I downloaded it again (this time it only took 42 hours!) and i clicked on the app once again. immediately after putting my information into the app the thing shut down and my snapchat and instagram was hacked. I bet my personal information was shipped to the Chinese or something because of this app. WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.title: i’ve been dying since i got the app
attributes.review:
to say the least, i expected more 😔and if i had the option to leave zero stars, i would! 🤪 i downloaded the app bc i tried to see what others see in this dude👱‍♂️ but guess what 🙀 all i saw were cheetos in my sleep for a whole week. they just kept attacking me 😪i felt disgusted 🤮from the moment i opened the app and guess what? i still do🤢 anyway, stan harry styles 🥰✨💓🤗🍉🥝🍓🙊🧚‍♂️ 

also, HUGE thanks to tiktok for telling me to be honest and review this app 😽 i know it’s tough sometimes but people HAVE to know how bad this app is 🥳

watermelon sugar HIGH 🍉 🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.title: Awful App!
attributes.review: It took 10 years to download. When I had opened the app, it was the first app that had a smell. It was a distinct and disgusting smell. A smell that would tell me “Can I see the manager?” It smelled like racist and homophobic narcissist. After the app finished loading which took forever, I noticed that my skin tone started to turn a bit orange and had a terrible and low quality spray tan. Even after I deleted the app, my posture started to turn terrible and I started to yell “fake news!” whenever watching CNN or MSNBC. I had to buy a new phone to reverse the changes. NEVER download this.
